entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backport fix for #43391 to .NET 6 #44215
  • Blazor WASM EventCallback Tuple #44214
  • ANCM (In-proc) can cause IIS worker process to become unhealthy #44211
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Reduce reliance on ApiExplorer types for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` consumption #44209
    .NET 8 Planning
  • BindingAddress handles bad ports poorly #44208
  • [Blazor] The `NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter()` method returns inappropriate URL when the current URL has a hash string #44204
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [SignalR] constantly reconnecting, timeout setting issue #44197

Closed

  • Kestrel not responding to HTTPS protcol with SSL #7684
    Backlog
  • Allow the encoder to split headers across frames #4722
    Backlog
  • Deployers for IIS Express and NGinx should provide default config files #5922
    Backlog
  • Consider adding tests for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IntegrationTesting package #5908
    Backlog
  • Azure App Services: consider grabbing environment variable when using InsertOrAppend #4136
    Backlog
  • Add test support for 32bit IIS Express #5893
    Backlog
  • Figure out pass-through compression for nginx #5989
    Backlog
  • Analyzer: Detect using Task<T> with RequestDelegate #42523
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Endpoint object serialisation overlooks a public field #43940
  • Issue when YARP is combined into a "normal" app #44085
    7.0-rc2
  • HTTPClient does not enclose name value in quotes when using Multipart form #44200
  • Azure SignalR support for CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration #44199
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorWasmManageyouraccountTwoPersonalData_DevTools:Incorrect role type provided to the "Delete" button as link. #42362
    7.0-rc2
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42369
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntEmail_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Change email" button is less than 3:1. #42372
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntProfile_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42371
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularForgotPassword_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Reset Password" button is less than 3:1. #42335
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactLogin_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Login" button and "Remember me" checkbox is less than 3:1. #42370
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntPWD_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Update password" button is less than 3:1. #42373
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42395
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppMVCRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42397
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42398
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccountprofile_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42399
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccounttwofactor_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Set up Authenticator app" and "Reset Authenticator app" button is less than 3:1. #42401
    7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] HTTPS connection failed, and The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #44181
  • [2.0] SignIn for cookies should honor AuthenticationProperties.RedirectUri #4667
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix junit output test file on timeout #44213
    area-signalr
  • [7.0] Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44207
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update docs to clarify feedback from #37240 #44212
    8.0-preview1
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44198
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix printing signing key in user-jwts tool #44206
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.0
  • Update docker tag to latest schema #44205
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add loc comments and fix Windows installer bug #44170
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44193
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Read HTTP_PORTS and HTTPS_PORTS into IServerAddresses #44194
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2005425 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling redux #44077
